resources.string: Allow AI learn your daily routine from collected data
Authorize the sharing of personal data with the company to improve users\' experiences
Only allow robot assistent move around in living room
"Alarm when user leave home and detect someone want to enter this house from door or windows "
Notice user by App when alarming
Lock all the windows and doors
Please Download Application on your smart phone!
Allow AI assistant collect information via your smart phone\'s microphone and cemera
Allow user check Energy cost and cotrol devices via application
Sync scene mode settings from Application
